alert.note: Alert for Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 3:30PM PDT until August 10 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM PDT FOR NORTHERN LANDER COUNTY... At 330 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southwest of Battle Mountain, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix Mine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
